xwikidoc.title: IRC Archive for channel #phenotips on 25 April 2013
xwikidoc.content: <froggy> has quit 01:22 <UCC> has quit 06:11 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 07:49 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 08:04 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu: Hey 08:04 <sdumitriu> Hey 08:05 <kushalkhandelwal> Good morning :) 08:05 <kushalkhandelwal> At home ? 08:06 <sdumitriu> Yep 08:18 <sdumitriu> Woohoo, all done for this release! 08:19 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 08:19 <kushalkhandelwal> Finally your major task done :D 08:49 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 10:02 <sdumitriu1> has joined #phenotips 10:21 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 10:46 <sdumitriu1> Ah, kushalkhandelwal, you broke something... 10:47 <kushalkhandelwal> ? 10:47 <kushalkhandelwal> What did i break ? 10:48 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: 10:49 <sdumitriu1> https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/issues/422 10:51 <sdumitriu1> It's my fault for not noticing it 10:51 <kushalkhandelwal> Wait let me check 10:51 <kushalkhandelwal> Will fix it tonight 10:52 <sdumitriu1> I'll fix it, I already have the code ready 10:54 <kushalkhandelwal> You fixed it 10:55 <sdumitriu1> K, now to get back to emails 10:55 <kushalkhandelwal> Never noticed 10:55 <kushalkhandelwal> My bad 10:55 <kushalkhandelwal> Point To remember : XML escaping while changing to filesystem ! 10:56 <kushalkhandelwal> Point Noted 10:56 <kushalkhandelwal> Emails ? 10:57 <sdumitriu1> Yeah, I have like 6 days of emails to answer 10:57 <sdumitriu1> Including GSoC proposals 10:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Including my emails :D 10:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes , many of them to answer 10:58 <kushalkhandelwal> Congratulation on one more release :) sdumitriu1 marta 11:10 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 11:27 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 11:29 <kushalkhandelwal> Too many disconnections 11:29 <kushalkhandelwal> Back in room 11:30 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: there ? 11:31 <sdumitriu1> Yep 11:31 <sdumitriu1> Do you have a twitter account? 11:32 <kushalkhandelwal> Yep 11:32 <kushalkhandelwal> @kushal124 11:37 <ravigarg27> has quit 11:44 <kushalkhandelwal> Thanks for the mentions :) 11:45 <sdumitriu1> Well, thank you for the contributions 11:46 <kushalkhandelwal> :) 11:46 <kushalkhandelwal> More to come 11:47 <sdumitriu1> I hope so 11:48 <kushalkhandelwal> There will be 12:14 <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 12:14 <sdumitriu1> !news 12:22 <sdumitriu1> So, Jenkins 12:23 <sdumitriu1> One thing is that it can deploy automatically to nexus.cs.toronto.edu 12:23 <sdumitriu1> And we need that 12:23 <sdumitriu1> It's easier to see just our projects, travis is a cloud for everybody 12:24 <sdumitriu1> It has a lot more plugins and configuration settings than Travis 12:24 <kushalkhandelwal> Ohh so automatic deployment of stable builds 12:24 <sdumitriu1> Yes 12:24 <kushalkhandelwal> Like ? 12:24 <sdumitriu1> Travis is mostly targeting small Ruby projects 12:25 <sdumitriu1> Jenkins is for Java projects 12:25 <sdumitriu1> https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/Plugins 12:26 <kushalkhandelwal> Jenkins can be used for other projects also 12:26 <kushalkhandelwal> Travis is used to build and check if new commits break the existing code 12:26 <kushalkhandelwal> Thats why unit tests for every piece of code you write 12:27 <kushalkhandelwal> Unit Tests 12:27 <kushalkhandelwal> Integration Tests 12:27 <kushalkhandelwal> and Dependency checks 12:43 <phenotips_org> has joined #phenotips 12:59 <kushalkhandelwal> sdumitriu1: 13:02 <sdumitriu1> kushalkhandelwal: I installed https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/Github+pull+request+builder+plugin 13:02 <sdumitriu1> Waiting for a pull request to test it... 13:02 <kushalkhandelwal> Nice :) 13:03 <kushalkhandelwal> Dont worry one would come soon 13:03 <kushalkhandelwal> I have a bug to fix 13:03 <kushalkhandelwal> would do it tonight 13:03 <kushalkhandelwal> not a bug but improvement 13:04 <sdumitriu1> I find that Jenkins has a nicer UI 13:04 <sdumitriu1> It reports which tests failed, and which were skipped 13:04 <sdumitriu1> Travis just says build passed/failed 13:04 <kushalkhandelwal> Yes 13:04 <kushalkhandelwal> it just reports the final status 13:05 <kushalkhandelwal> Nicer UI ? 13:13 <sdumitriu1> Easy issues for GSoC students: https://github.com/compbio-UofT/phenotips/issues?labels=easy&page=1&state=open 13:26 <Krinye_> has quit 13:38 <kushalkhandelwal> Some issue with it ? 13:53 <qwebirc765015> has joined #phenotips 13:53 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 13:53 <qwebirc765015> is now known as <kushalkhandelwal> 14:12 <ravigarg27> has left #phenotips 14:44 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 14:45 <kushalk124> has quit 14:49 <kushalk124> has quit 14:53 <kushalk124> has quit 14:58 <kushalk124> has quit 15:02 <kushalk124> has quit 15:06 <kushalk124> has quit 15:07 <froggy> has quit 15:12 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 15:20 <qwebirc176207> is now known as <kushalk124> 15:20 <kushalk124> has joined #phenotips 15:23 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 15:43 <kushalk124> is now known as <kushalkhandelwal> 16:42 <kushalkhandelwal> has quit 16:47 <froggy> has quit 17:04 <Dhritiman> has quit 18:35 <sdumitriu1> has quit 21:57 <ravigarg27> has joined #phenotips 22:35 <kushalkhandelwal> has joined #phenotips 23:52 <froggy> has quit
